special_text:
As Lilith enters, create Daring Adventures, a legendary colorless artifact token with “{2}, {T}: Draw a card.”
[+1]: Tap or untap up to one target artifact and up to one target creature.
[-3]: Create two 1/1 blue Drake creature tokens with flying.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Whenever an opponent casts their first spell each turn, you gain control of it and may choose new targets.”
